headline: Could NCLH’s New CEO Appointment Redefine Norwegian’s Distribution Edge And Long-Term Investment Story?
summary: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings recently appointed travel industry veteran Marc Kazlauskas as President of Norwegian Cruise Line, effective January 19, 2026, bringing more than 30 years of senior leadership experience across global sales, operations, and innovation. His background leading major travel agencies and platforms gives Norwegian closer access to distribution partners and customer data at a time when it is expanding its fleet and enhancing destinations like Great Stirrup Cay. We’ll...

headline: Jim Cramer on Viking Holdings: “That Is My Favorite”
summary: Viking Holdings Ltd (NYSE:VIK) is one of the travel and leisure stocks Jim Cramer recently talked about. Cramer called it his favorite during the episode, as he remarked: “Finally, as I looked over the S&P 500’s top gainers today, I noticed that three of the top five gains came from major cruise line companies.
